page.title: 10THORPE'S PLAYING FIELD
page.content: FOR MANY YEARS PEOPLE HERE HAVE WANTED A PLAYING FIELD FOR THE CHILDREN OF THE VILLAGE. NOW AT LAST WE HAVE ONE AND BY THE END OF THE YEAR IT SHOULD BE COMPLETED. THE FIELD IS BEHIND THE SOCIAL CLUB ON LAND BELONGING TO THORPE HALL BUT SOON THERE WILL BE A NEW ENTRANCE TO IT OPPOSITE OAK CLOSE IN FRINTON ROAD. THE PARISH COUNCIL HAVE HAD TO WAIT UNTIL THE FARMER HARVESTED HIS CROPS ON THE LAND WHERE THE ENTRANCE IS TO BE. THE FIELD WILL BE EASIER TO GET TO ONCE THE ROAD IS BUILT. THERE IS GOING TO BE A FOOTBALL PITCH AND PRACTICE AREA, HOOPS, CLIMBING FRAME, A SAND PIT, TREES TO CLIMB AND LOTS OF OTHER THINGS AS WELL. THERE WILL BE A CAR PARKING AREA, AND A NEW SCOUT HUT ON THE SITE. IT WILL NOT COST A THING TO PLAY ON THE FIELD.
